sense.def:
Kadar je zvok
muffled
, je tih, nerazločen ali slabo slišen.

seg.quote: ‘I don't know,’ he said in a muffled voice.

sense.def:
Kadar je človek
muffled
ali
muffled up
, nosi debela, topla oblačila, ki zakrivajo večji del telesa ali obraza.

seg.quote: He was heavily muffled in a black overcoat.
...a boy muffled up in a blue scarf.
